website_summaries.verdict: Provides precise assistance needed for boots, shoes, and more. A good choice if you're OK with a plastic shoe horn.
pros: Easy to use, effortless to grip
Long handle limits need for bending
Made of durable, thick plastic and backed by lifetime guarantee
cons: Made of plastic, which some don't prefer

customer_reviews.title: My best solution so far.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 99 year old man who has gotten to the age where putting on my shoes without the aid of an extra long shoe horn has become an issue. For years I have kept a small inventory of extra long shoe horns to donate to offices where they want your shoes off (sometimes with everything else!), but do not offer assistance with putting them back on. These are the best that I have found in that they are inexpensive, durable, nice looking and the handle is a plus. Although made of plastic, they seem like they will last.....if the offices don't let them go out the door with the patients and customers.
customer_reviews.author: Old Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great for us old guys
customer_reviews.text: Don't have to bend now to get my shoes on. I was breaking down the backs of my shoes getting them on. My knees aren't what the use to be. I leave all my shoes loosely tied so I can just slip them on and off at the door when going in or out of the house. It has gotten to the point that it would be easer to do so if I had a long handled shoe horn. I took a measurement to see how long it needed it to be and these are the right length and price, besides I got two so I can have one upstairs and one down.
customer_reviews.author: IMHOGYLD

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Where have you been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe horn is a life saver, literally! Came really fast! I love shoes like any other lady but I have been struggling to put some of them on and end up just wearing slip on! With this, I was able to put my ankle boots, my other shoes that were just looking good and collecting dust. Thank you thank you. Since it comes in a pair, I have one in the mud room and one in the house by the entrance door on a command and every one now uses it! Cheeky baggers! Lol! Awesome product and sturdy. Just place it at the back of the shoe, slip your foot in and go! No bending down. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Fits the need!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband after he purchase one that was poorly designed. I figured the two pack would be great to keep one in a suitcase. Well, it didn't make it that far. My husband has one hanging where he can grab it as he puts on his shoes. The other one, I use it to remove my socks at the end of the day. Old back injuries make it difficult to remove socks at the end of the day. The long handle on this unit makes it simple to remove my socks! We are both super pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A. Manville

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who can't bend
customer_reviews.text: This product is durable and works great for anyone who has trouble bending. My husband had a couple of extendable ones but they always broke. Even though those were easier to travel with, this shoe horn is truly excellent in the ease of use and length to avoid any low bending for older people in particular. He liked them so m much this is the 2nd set I have bought. They are placed in the entryway, bedroom and basement doorway. Also have one in luggage ready for a trip! Great value, great quality. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mel O

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Two pair for what others charge for one is a bargain. Also, the plastic is sturdy. I read other people who said the shoehorns did not last long or the plastic split. Not sure what size foot they were trying to squeeze into what size shoe, but unless the shoehorn had a defect, I can not see how the plastic would split with normal use. The ONLY DRAWBACK is the handle is oval instead of round so it DOES NOT hang over the doorknob. I'll have to add something to make it hang. Otherwise, I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Summers

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a very long shoehorn. I got it to assist in putting on boots, and that's how it works. Because it is so long, I can get on boots from a sitting or standing position. Actually, with this shoehorn, standing and stepping into the boots is easier than sitting and trying to pull on boots..
customer_reviews.author: Gloria H.

customer_reviews.title: Make your morning easier
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how sick a simple thing can make life so much easier. We have one at the front door, the other at the garage door. I don't know what made my husband think if these, but they work great - no bending. Just need someone to tie my shoes laces - ha! Sending one to both our mom's. Might seem like an odd gift, but it's one we know will be used!
customer_reviews.author: jacklenny

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe horns ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these and liked them so much I bought more for my Dad and my daughters' households. (Mainly because I wanted to be able to use them when I am at their house!) But they are sturdy, easy to use, and the handle makes it extra easy to get the horn in the heel of my shoe. Great bargain, love these!
customer_reviews.author: Sunbeams

customer_reviews.title: WORK GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband who has hip and knee problems. They are sturdy and the perfect length. He can now put his shoes on without help and without pain. He is also able to use them on the front of the shoe by the tongue so it doesn't get pushed down when he is putting on his shoe. We will not be without these again.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: SO much easier to put on my shoes now!
customer_reviews.text: I"ve never used a shoe horn before and found myself needing one. The price was right and came in a set, so now I have two! They are a little long but would be really nice for a taller person. I am 5'5". This horn makes putting on my slip on shoes SO much easier! I'm very glad I saw these on Amazon! They are made of thin sturdy plastic. Very smooth. They are shoe horns! They do what shoe horns do! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Vwink

customer_reviews.title: A must for boots
customer_reviews.text: My only regrets that I didn't order this product sooner. I keep one in the bedroom and one in the mudroom and use them daily. Especially important to assist with boots when a short shoe horn is not adequate. As my husband and I have gotten into our 70s, getting into shoes has become more challenging. But a little help from a long shoe horn is good at any age.
customer_reviews.author: myriam palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I wear an orthopedic shoe insert because I teach 8 or more hours a day and drive two hours or more. I was having trouble getting my shoes on with the inserts, and I was wrecking the backs of my shoes. These work like a dream, allowing me to position the insert in my shoe and then put my foot in while standing.
customer_reviews.author: OpinionatedLady

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Plastic Shoe Horns
customer_reviews.text: Metal shoe horns tend to break. Plastic shoe horns tend to bend out of shape and become useless over time. These plastic shoe horns are study enough to resist bending and I have not managed to break one. Just a little bit too long for my carry on luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Studmuffin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be good quality shoehorns however they are not quite 24 inch. I've measured them and seem to be about 22. I have an old one that broke, not the same brand and that was a full 24. Anyway, not a big deal. They seem to be well made but in the end, they are just shoehorns after all.
customer_reviews.author: MLG

customer_reviews.title: Helped Me
customer_reviews.text: I somehow hurt my back in my misspent youth. Putting on and tying my shoes became a real challenge. My dad taught me the value of a shoe horn long ago and this shoe horn has been saving me from an ongoing struggle with my shoes. The 24" length is just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Knott

customer_reviews.title: For being not of metal it seems to be durable and it slips the shoe on very easily.
customer_reviews.text: I have a metal shoe horn about the same length. I like this non metal much more because of the handle and it slips the shoe on with more ease then the metal one . I'm glad i got two of them for different location the extra large handle makes it easy to hang up on a large 3m command hook. My metal one doesn't have a handle to hang thu I'm alway looking where I last put it. not a problem with this one that hangs on it own hook
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Love these long shoe horns
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased these two long shoe horns. Sturdy, thick, smooth plastic that will last. It's so convenient using these that I have one at each door. I am accustomed to using shoe horns and these made life a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you have Lower Back Problems. I could not get my shoes or boots on without them. I leave one in bedroom and other by entrance door. Nice you get two. Made With High Quality Material. Nice extra long handel. With Loop on end to make easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Silecchio

customer_reviews.title: Usefully and durable
customer_reviews.text: Solid 1 piece, long reach (while standing), durable I have bought several over the years and stash them everywhere but the bed, my gym bag, van, travel bag. I use them multiple times daily and none have broken yet
customer_reviews.author: jacksan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Decided to order this for my Dad when he had a bad knee and mild swelling in feet. He had hard time trying to "fit" into his shoes wile not able to bend enough due to the knee. While ordering, I still thought that these are expensive , esp for plastic, but I'm not disappointed, as these are sturdier than I expected and a good length for people of different heights. I have the extra one for visitors and they appreciate the convenience as well :) *****
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less Bending Over
customer_reviews.text: I'm a person with a lower back and hip problem. With this lone shoe horn I don't have to been over to get my shoes on. I also have a sock assist to get my socks on. Once I get them on I had trouble to get them off. With these shoe horns I can slip it under the top of my socks and they come off so easy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, easy off
customer_reviews.text: These are the best items to have in your closet - for women you don’t have to bend over or sit and bend your legs - just slip the shoehorn in and you’re good to go - y husband loves his too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Horanberg

customer_reviews.title: Long Horns
customer_reviews.text: I keep one in my car for golf days & one by the shoe rack. It's much easier & less painful (bad knees) to use these long horns. Worth the cost. The plastic construction seems heavy & sturdy enough for the job.
customer_reviews.author: fhk

customer_reviews.title: Works Well While Standing
customer_reviews.text: We remove our shoes when we come into the house, so we keep one of these near each of our outside doors to make it easy to put our shoes back on when we leave the house. They work well while standing -- no need to sit or bend down.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Owl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Even though these are not metal, they are very strong. I've been using this product for over 2 years, and decided to buy one for the garage and utility room. There's a 2.5" logo on the foot side of the shoe horn, which I don't even notice. The plastic is thicker than metal, so if you really need to squeeze your foot into your shoe, these may be for you. Work great, and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and helpful device.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I each have one of these shoe horns and we use them everyday. It just makes putting on shoes a lot easier as they slide on with this smooth shoe horn.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Janicki

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this product. I have grandparents that have problems getting their shoes on. This helps them get ready to go without having to bend down.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Akio Hamai

customer_reviews.title: Big help for folks with back pain
customer_reviews.text: After two back surgeries, some muscles are quite stiff in the morning. These shoe horns make slipping shoes on so much easier. Well made, right length, and heel cup slim enough for easy shoe slip-ons.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff MacConnell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? No need to get on my knees and use my finger as a shoe horn. I've come to the age when bending down is now a task!! Can't go wrong with one of these, let alone 2 of them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kourt Kop

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the money. Had a hip problem and I started using these. Now I like them even for my shoe I don’t need help with. I don’t un-tie my shoes anymore. Makes getting shoes on easy peezy.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoeReview

customer_reviews.title: Great product, tremendous value!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy shoehorn, but not painful like metal. Great for putting shoes on sitting down or standing up. You get not one but two. Very pleased! Five star product and a five star seller!
customer_reviews.author: Cattleman's

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Value!
customer_reviews.text: This shoehorn is the perfect length standing or sitting. It is very good quality, and best of all, you get 2 for the price of most other companies 1!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Bruesewitz

customer_reviews.title: Dang handy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these ALL of the time and have one by each door in my home where i take off / put on my shoes. Im kind of lazy & hate untying and tying my shoes so I use these so I dont smash the backs of my shoes when shoving my foot in them, And they work splendidly!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 97 year old Grammy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, shoe glides on, & long handle makes putting shoes on very easy for 97 year old Grammy.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: Both broke within 18 months of use. Not durable at all. I am giving 2 stars just for good price for a pair of them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Just got the 24" long shoe horns and from the first use I wondered why I hadn't thought of these before. Perfect. Nothing else to add. They work like a charm and are perfect for my 6'4" height. Thanks for speedy delivery!
customer_reviews.author: R. Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace a 12" shoehorn I'd had for many years that I used for getting my winter suede boots on. These are sturdy, and I really appreciate the extra length. Makes the task even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly parents
customer_reviews.text: These are great for not bending down. Got them for both parents. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: jtran

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I chose this because of its high ratings and good reviews. Not cheap quality For those who say it broke the first time they use it, everything in this world will last a little bit more if handled with care.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe horns
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Very sturdy & strong plastic. You get 2 of them for the price of one. Great deal. I like that they are extra long and have a large handle so you dont have to bend as much.
customer_reviews.author: OC88

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 81 year old mother and she loves them. She appreciated getting 2 so she can have one in the bedroom and another in the hall closet.
customer_reviews.author: CL564

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: As much as using a product like this makes me feel like an elderly person, it is a fabulous invention and works very well. Shipping was quick and I am totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: gillysmom2000

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient for those days when the back is hurting!
customer_reviews.author: Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I like not having to bend over to get my heel in shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: They are long enoough to provide an old man the reach to the shoe that is no longer there!
customer_reviews.text: They are long enoough to provide an old man the reach to the shoe that is no longer there!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I find it simple to use and its very sturdy. its very comfortable to use without me bending down too much (may differ for taller individuals). Its a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra shoe horns around the house (reason for my purchase) I have one old one by the back door. these new ones work great so far. I would have preferred a cord as a hanging feature (the "loop" on these leave me baffled).
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Kniebes

customer_reviews.title: Great size for sitting or standing
customer_reviews.text: Still early to know about durability. But the plastic seems tough, and it works.
customer_reviews.author: RJackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for use with elastic shoestrings!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height. I don’t need to bend as far when I put on my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: indispensible
customer_reviews.text: The best uni-tasker around. Everyone over 35 should have these. a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: ERMARC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe Horn
customer_reviews.text: We found this shoe horn to be good quality and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: KAK

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: perfect length, solid material, not flimsy, hangs by the door by its handy built-in oval. it works
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Hard for me to bend over and his elongated shoe horn allows me to put my shoes on without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this to remove his working boots. He said it works and does its job with out messing up his boots back end.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Morales

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo Helpful! Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so perfect we ordered an extra two. I'll be happy when we can cut down on the packing though.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: High quality and very rapid shipping -- an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: As expected except plastic type
customer_reviews.text: Just received them and did not expect such brittle plastic. We’ll see how they work out, hopefully they won’t easily break. Otherwise size, length and handle as expected.
customer_reviews.author: STCLA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length.
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather lives not having to bend over any longer to put in his shoes.
customer_reviews.author: steevo92115

customer_reviews.title: STOP BENDING OVER
customer_reviews.text: WORKS WELL. EASIER THAT ONE OF THE LITTLE SHORT ONES. PLASTIC HAS HELD UP WELL
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Love them! They are long enough for boots, but I use them for shoes, since my back has arthritis and I don't have to bend down as far.
customer_reviews.author: Series Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very functional. I don't have to bend down to put on my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: r2_gb2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great for my everyday activities to out on my shoes
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT H

customer_reviews.title: The extra long handle is perfect for slipping on dress shoes without bending the heal ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product for myself. The extra long handle is perfect for slipping on dress shoes without bending the heal of the shoe. I ordered a second set as a gift for my parents. My dad uses the extra long shoe horn to easily slide on his boots.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: perfect for home and the office when wearing boots in the snowy winter.
customer_reviews.author: TKF

customer_reviews.title: Nice length
customer_reviews.text: At 73 years old I love not having to bend over to put on my footwear,. Nice sturdy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Looks like what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: At first was concerned that it is made of plastic, but can see it it very sturdy, longer than ordinary shoe horns, but once I get used to it, should be fine-looking forward to using it-due to my disabilities, the short shoe horns don't work.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD E HURLEY

customer_reviews.title: No need to bend over
customer_reviews.text: Made from quality plastic. Long handle makes it easy to put on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: GreT for limited flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars but I have only had them 3 days. Not as sturdy as the metal ones but functional and at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O'Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Works great should have purchased one before
customer_reviews.text: No more bending over to put heal down into shoe
customer_reviews.author: Larry Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Longer and easier to use than the more expensive and more fragile one that they replace.
customer_reviews.author: paul/california

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoe horns because of my difficulty bending over because of a bad back. They work extremely well and are light weight. The shoe horn is very sturdy and I think the are a great value. I keep one in my car so I have one if I travel for any reason. I would definitely recommend them to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: pinevol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought for my Dad, he has arthritis in his knee. I was surprised to see how sturdy it was, and I got to keep one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great help for those with mobility issues and also for those in a hurry that hate to untie/tie their shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just the right length for me at 6’. Very hefty and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE HORN!
customer_reviews.text: These shoe horns are wonderful! Nice and stiff/sturdy. Good length also. My wife broke her left hip 5 weeks ago and this shoe horn makes it easy for her to put her slippers and shoes on. Would be perfect for folks with a back issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Patten

customer_reviews.title: Firm but not brittle
customer_reviews.text: Long handle is perfect made from a firm plastic so it doesn't bend while being used, excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Ole L

customer_reviews.title: but these are great for my husband and me
customer_reviews.text: A little large for my children, but these are great for my husband and me. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: dswong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for anyone, even a women. With a bad back and unable to bend over it makes it so easy for me to put shoes on. Appears to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one long stron shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: This is a shoe horn with a long handle. Strong. Husband likes it. but there's only ONE in the package. Didn't care enough to complain. One is all he needs.
customer_reviews.author: M. T.

customer_reviews.title: Save your back and knees! Its great!
customer_reviews.text: Best things ever. Helps with my bad back , hips, and knees. Love it! I put my shoes on with ease. Wish I got one sooner so it would have saved my knees!
customer_reviews.author: twadkins

customer_reviews.title: Good length , easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my needs. I use these to put on my slip on muck shoes that set on my back porch. I'm 6'2" and the length works well for me. The handle makes it easy to hang on the wall. I have one outside and I keep one inside for other shoes. My wife started using it and found it works well for her too.
customer_reviews.author: Dobi

customer_reviews.title: The shoehorns are better than I expected and a lot sturdier that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Somehow Amazon got shoehorn and shoe mixed up in the questionaire. The shoehorns are better than I expected and a lot sturdier that the product they are replacing. I expect I will get years of service out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ayvini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than those from Walmart which cracked after very little use. These are mich thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Top flight Shoe Horn
customer_reviews.text: Shoe horn works well. Plastic but strong enough that you need not worry about breaking it. I recommend this item and vendor to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Elmendorf

customer_reviews.title: A perfect little gift that makes life a little easier.
customer_reviews.text: I gave one to my mother in law in Bogota Colombia and she loves it. And her 5 sister and 4 brother's are so envous
customer_reviews.author: Warren mason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These were just what my husband needed. He was pleased with the length and how sturdy they are.
customer_reviews.author: nancyC17

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: A good sturdy plastic shoe horn that works well without having to bend down from a seated position.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cannot go wrong in the works very well specially if you have a hard time bending over
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: a strong and sturdy product that I know will last for a very long time. We've had them before, but never this well made. Thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this twice. Once for my husband and again for my Mom. They love them. Easy to use, hangs up on a hook easy, makes getting out the door go faster.
customer_reviews.author: N. Valenti

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe horn............I have a very easy time putting my shoes on now.............no bending..........easy to use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I can't understand what took me so long to order this. My back thanks you also. Absolutely wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: phlightyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: As I get older bending over has become an uncomfortable challenge. This shoe horn is beyond helpful making a once difficult task, easy. I just wish I had picked this up years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Tater

customer_reviews.title: Something you never thought you needed
customer_reviews.text: It's a very very long shoe horn. I like it because it saves bending over. You do need to practice to master this beauty. Not something I ever thought I would say about a shoe horn.
customer_reviews.author: Braunsky

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well for my husband. He has a bad back and this did the trick. It is very sturdy, not flimsy at all. The length was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Really does the job
customer_reviews.text: For anyone over 30 years old, this is a must have. I keep one upstairs and one in my bedroom. I love not having to bend over to put on my shoes. Buy it for any body and they will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: BigDogsMom

customer_reviews.title: Easy on your back
customer_reviews.text: Extra long handle makes it a breeze putting on dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length, shape, smoothness
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Perfect length, shape, and smoothness to put on any shoe without bending over. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: ForEcol

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy at Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and convinient at the hour of putting thigh shoes on you dont have to get down to the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Diaz

product_meta.title: 24" Extra Long Plastic Shoe Horn | Set of 2 | Shoe Horn for Men Long Handle, Women, Kids, Seniors, Boots & Shoes.
product_meta.description:
